Notes

Fall 2025
Corpus Linguistics
LING 413 · Jonathan Dunn

Introduction to corpus-based methods for linguistic analysis, exploring large text collections and computational approaches to language patterns.

Computational Linguistics
LING 406 · Alexandre Maskharashvili

Foundations of computational approaches to natural language, covering parsing, semantics, and language processing algorithms.

Machine Learning
CS 446 · Liangyan Gui

Core machine learning concepts including supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, and practical applications.

Deep Generative Models
ECE 498 · Romit Roy Choudhury

Advanced topics in generative modeling, including VAEs, GANs, and diffusion models for data generation.

Beginner's Basque
BASQ 401 · Maialen Casquete De La Puente

Introduction to the Basque language, exploring its unique grammar and cultural context.
